Comment: It will be pleasure for my opponents to know that I still can make such horible moves like Nh4 in this game. My opponent challenged me to rematch after I won lost ending in previous one. I misjudged opponent after that game and missed some tactics including mate. My position collapsed in several moves leading to mate.
